altername_name: Rocket'n'Roll: A Trip of a Lifetime
name: Rocket'n'Roll
overview: For many years the Sun was an impossible destination to reach. That was until rocket technology expanded further. You and a friend successfully build a pink and a blue rocket and toss it in to space for a trip of a lifetime. Unfortunately you crash into space garbage. Now you have to fly through 4 dangerous zones, guarded by aliens. Blast your way against the enemies, and try to find your destination. Collect shields to protect yourself from aliens and deadly background obstacles.
